articles.title: John Isner says goodbye at US Open after game-changing tennis career - USA TODAY
articles.description: The towering John Isner, whose dominating serve helped change Grand Slam tennis, is retiring. His career was impressive, and underappreciated.
articles.content: NEW YORK When it was all over not just the match but the remarkable career he wove together out of an extra tall body, a massive serve and a willingness to embrace what he was and wasnt on a tennis c… [+6926 chars]
